title: WayVision
overview: In the first project of the show, the seven members will become reporters as they travel in Gangwondo and compete for the best channel content about their travels. The show will also showcase many sides of the seven members, from enjoyable thrilling activities in green nature to a trip on a luxurious yacht on the wide sea, and even to a meokbang for Gangwondo's delicacies. At the end of 3 days and 2 nights, the "best channel" will be awarded.
